lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins blew a two-goal lead in their Stanley Cup final opener against San Jose on Monday but Nick Bonino's strike with 2:33 remaining in the third period lifted them to a 3-2 victory over the Sharks.

headline.print_headline: Penguins Beat Sharks in Stanley Cup Opener
headline.main: Penguins Beat Sharks in Stanley Cup Opener
